description: A neighbor is at your door and accuses you of having been an accomplice in the theft of his car, which was yesterday, you have a minute to argue that he is wrong.
Your mother has found out that you failed the school year, she threatened to remove you from school, you have to convince her not to do it.
Your best friend has asked you to help him study math, but you want to be alone, try to explain to him that you can't without hurting his feelings.
You have just invented an intelligent robot (T-222) that helps with housework, you are in front of 6 investors you have to convince them to invest in your project.
